title: Web Development
description: Build interactive, modern websites from scratch.

title: React Masterclass
description: Become proficient in React and modern frontend tools.

title: UI/UX Design
description: Learn how to create beautiful, user-friendly interfaces.

title: Node.js Fundamentals
description: Learn to build scalable backend applications using Node.js and Express.

title: Database Design
description: Understand relational models, normalization, and SQL to manage structured data effectively.

title: Python for Beginners
description: Start programming with Python and learn the basics of logic, syntax, and problem-solving.

title: JavaScript Essentials
description: Master the core concepts of JavaScript and DOM manipulation for dynamic web pages.

title: Full-Stack Development
description: Combine frontend and backend skills to build complete web applications.

title: Cybersecurity Basics
description: Explore security principles, vulnerabilities, and best practices to protect digital systems.

title: Data Analysis with Python
description: Use Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib to analyze and visualize real-world data.

title: Git & Version Control
description: Learn to collaborate and manage code with Git, GitHub, and effective branching strategies.

title: Cloud Computing Foundations
description: Understand the basics of cloud services, deployment models, and popular providers like AWS and Azure.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Build cross-platform mobile apps using modern frameworks and responsive design principles.
